[Life Shot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1899)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** round

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Life shot is a special cartridge that carries a small dose of [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91). A creature hit by activated life shot takes no damage from the successful attack, instead receiving healing and gaining an item bonus to saving throws against [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) and [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) for 1 minute. On a critical hit, roll the healing received twice and take the better result (this is a [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76) effect). A target willing to be hit by this attack is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against it.
